SEARCH

Package com.bcb.vetra.services

package com.bcb.vetra.services
This package contains services that provide extra functionality to the VetRA application.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.bcb.vetra
    Main package for the VetRA project.
    com.bcb.vetra.controllers
    This package contains the controllers for the VetRA application.
    com.bcb.vetra.daos
    This package contains the Data Access Objects (DAOs) for the VetRA application.
    com.bcb.vetra.exception
    This package contains the custom exception classes that are thrown by the application.
    com.bcb.vetra.models
    This package contains the model classes for the VetRA application.
    com.bcb.vetra.viewmodels
    This package contains the view models for the application.
  • Class
    Description
    AccessControl
    Access Control Service

    This class is responsible for providing more specific access control to resources based on user roles.
    CustomUserDetailsService
    Custom user details service for JWT authentication.
    MessageNotification
    Service class for sending notifications to users when they receive an email.
    MockVmsIntegration
    Mock VMS integration to be replaced by an external API.
    VmsIntegration
    Interface for the VMS integration service This service is responsible for checking for new tests from the Veterinary Management System (VMS) and updating the database with them.
